Package arcade.potts.agent.module

Class PottsModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.potts.agent.module.PottsModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PottsModuleApoptosis, PottsModuleAutosis, PottsModuleNecrosis, PottsModuleProliferation, PottsModuleQuiescence
    public abstract class PottsModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements Module
    Abstract implementation of Module for PottsCell agents.

    Each module represents the behaviors of a cell in a given state. Module behaviors are further divided by phases, such as the phases of the cell cycle for a cell in the proliferative state.
